title: can't open file 'setup.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory
body_html:
So I'm trying to install PyTorch from source. But when I'm trying to run the final command,
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install
my terminal throws this
python: can't open file 'setup.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory

So how can I get rid of this and install PyTorch?

INFO :
OS : macOS 10.13.6
CUDA version : 9.2
cuDNN : 9.2
xcode CLT ( macOS 10.12 version 8.2)
Anaconda3 is installed.
clang --version
Apple LLVM version 8.0.0 (clang-800.0.42.1)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.7.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin

body:
So I'm trying to install PyTorch from source.  But when I'm trying to run the final command,
`MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install` 
my terminal throws this
`python: can't open file 'setup.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory`

So how can I get rid of this and install PyTorch?

INFO :
OS : macOS 10.13.6
CUDA version : 9.2
cuDNN : 9.2
xcode CLT ( macOS 10.12 version 8.2)
Anaconda3 is installed. 
`clang --version`
`Apple LLVM version 8.0.0 (clang-800.0.42.1)`
`Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.7.0`
`Thread model: posix`
`InstalledDir: /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin`
